trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.

When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.

The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class.
This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class, specifying the text of the instance.
The value used to set the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text"></xref> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
Gets or sets the text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class instance.
The text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
An attempt is made to set <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text"></xref> to `null`.
